name: Kodak EasyShare Data File
summary: Learn about .MBB files and view a list of programs that open them.

windows.name: Open over 400 file formats with File Viewer Plus.Free Download

content: If the EasyShare software is not loading properly ("EasyShare is unable to run..." or a similar message), sometimes users can fix the problem by rebuilding the picture catalog, which requires manual deletion of the ebsk.mbb and ebsk.mb files.
NOTE: Kodak discontinued the development of the EasyShare program.

description: File generated by Kodak EasyShare, an application used to organize and share digital photos; contains information used by the program for creating picture catalogs; always uses the name ebsk.mbb, and is located with another related file called ebsk.mb.
